statements: CREATE TABLE games (game_id INT PRIMARY KEY, game_name STRING, release_year INT, genre STRING)
CREATE TABLE players (player_id INT PRIMARY KEY, player_name STRING, age INT, nationality STRING)
CREATE TABLE scores (score_id INT PRIMARY KEY, game_id INT, player_id INT, score INT)
CREATE TABLE players ( player_id INT PRIMARY KEY, player_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, player_level INT NOT NULL )
CREATE TABLE games ( game_id INT PRIMARY KEY, game_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, game_genre VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, release_year INT NOT NULL )
CREATE TABLE players ( player_id INT PRIMARY KEY, player_name STRING, level INT );
CREATE TABLE games ( game_id INT PRIMARY KEY, game_name STRING, release_date DATE, genre STRING );
CREATE TABLE scores ( score_id INT PRIMARY KEY, player_id INT, game_id INT, score INT, FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES players(player_id), FOREIGN KEY (game_id) REFERENCES games(game_id) );
CREATE TABLE GamePublisher ( publisher_id INT PRIMARY KEY, publisher_name VARCHAR(255), headquarters VARCHAR(255) );
CREATE TABLE GamePlatform ( platform_id INT PRIMARY KEY, platform_name VARCHAR(255), launch_year INT, manufacturer VARCHAR(255) );

CREATE TABLE PlayerStats ( player_id INT, game_id INT, total_playtime INT, achievements INT, PRIMARY KEY (player_id, game_id), FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES Player(player_id), FOREIGN KEY (game_id) REFERENCES Game(game_id) );
CREATE TABLE Player (PlayerID INT PRIMARY KEY, PlayerName VARCHAR(50), Age INT, Email VARCHAR(50), HighScore INT);
CREATE TABLE Game (GameID INT PRIMARY KEY, GameName VARCHAR(50), ReleaseDate DATE, Genre VARCHAR(50), Platform VARCHAR(50);
CREATE TABLE PlayerGameHistory (PlayerID INT, GameID INT, PlayTimeInHours INT, Score INT, FOREIGN KEY (PlayerID) REFERENCES Player(PlayerID), FOREIGN KEY (GameID) REFERENCES Game(GameID));
